properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ee Baba Baba yetu
uliye mbinguni,
jina lako litukuzwe.
Ufalme ufalme wako na utufikie
utakalo lifanyike.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Utupe leo mkate wetu
ee Baba -
utakalo lifanyike.
Mkate wetu wa kila siku
ee Baba -
utakalo lifanyike.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tusamehe makosa yetu
ee Baba -
utakalo lifanyike.
Kama vile twawasamehe
ee baba -
utakalo lifanyike.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Na usitutie kishawishini
ee baba -
utakalo lifanyike.
Maovuni utuopoe
ee baba -
utakalo lifanyike.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Kwa kuwa nguvu na utukufu
ee Baba -
utakalo lifanyike.
Ni zako hata milele
ee Baba -
utakalo lifanyike.
